name: Warden's Staff
description:
"Simple and effective."
—Warden Brulians

name: Wyld Hunt Training Bow
description:
"We aren't expert marksmen the moment we awaken."
—Diantha

name: Opticalium Focusing Stick
description:
"This is an Opticalium-approved energy-focusing device."
—Opticalium Researcher Oisha

name: Wardenhurst Mace
description:
"We reinforce these with our own special techniques."
—Warden Gemai

name: Briar Mace
description:
"The tools you collected will help maintain the wall. Use these weapons as your tools against the Risen."
—Brannen

name: Test Associate's Staff Mark I
description:
"It's been recalibrated using the energy readings we took in this area. It'll be quite effective."
—Kamma

name: Quetzal Trident
description:
"Our trusty weapons are at your disposal friend."
—Yoal

name: Force-Amplifying Impact Device
description: <c=@flavor>"When finesse fails, try hitting it with a blunt object."</c>

name: Skritt Herder
description: <c=@flavor>If it looks intimidating to you, imagine how it looks to a skritt.</c>

name: Fireman's Axe
description:
"For emergencies only."
—Krewe Leader Pachoo

name: Trusty Pistol
description: <c=@flavor>"Crude, but functional."</c>

name: Model RX-11 Rifle
description:
"Excessive use has been linked to hearing loss in skritt."
—Dr. Klagg

name: Kraitbane Model I Pistol
description:
"Our business is killing krait, and business is good."
—Lionguard Hester

name: Potatlan's Axe
description:
"If you think an undead is going to suck out your eyeballs, protect yourself by covering them and swinging!"
—Potatlan

name: Brightgrown Longbow
description:
"Infused with the morning's light."
—Wyld Hunt Valiant Caillech

name: Briar Sword
description:
"Our priority is to defend this wall. However, if you find this useful for fighting Risen, then good hunting."
—Brannen

name: Mossy Scepter
description:
"Found it just laying in the bog, imagine that."
—Issa

name: Shield
description:
"Nothing gets past this shield."
—Nessi

name: Soundless Hammer
description:
"Sure to quiet the loudest riot."
—Eona

name: Ancient Longbow
description: <c=@flavor>Although it looks like it belongs in a museum, this bow packs a real punch.</c>

name: Packmaster's Warhorn
description:
"The call of the wild is more than just a saying."
—Packmaster Danador

name: Razor-Sharp Dagger
description:
"Not my fault if you cut yourself!"
—Bordekka

name: Patrol Torch
description:
"Can't have a proper patrol without a proper torch."
—Lionguard Cern

name: Waterlogged Rifle
description:
"You scratched my back, and now I'll scratch yours. Take a look at this crate of rifles we recovered from the wreck of the Argent Warrior. See any you like?"
—Admiral Clarinda Demard

name: Skritt Poker
description: <c=@flavor>"Sometimes you need to give them a little poke to get them moving."</c>

name: Whitland Short Bow
description:
"If there ceases to be a source of pollution, then we can make some headway in reversing its effects."
—Carmel

name: Wyld Hunt Training Short Bow
description:
"Fires with deadly accuracy."
—Diantha

name: Lionguard Warhorn
description: <c=@flavor>"A single blast can rally the troops."</c>

name: Rifle
description:
"You see it; you can shoot it."
—Nessi

name: Mace
description: <c=@flavor>"Sometimes you have to bash a few heads to calm things down."</c>

name: Quetzal Speargun
description:
"Our trusty weapons are at your disposal friend."
—Yoal

name: Brackwater Village Focus
description:
"You act with the honor of Wardens. Thank you for your help."
—Quennida

name: Dryground Village Longbow
description:
"Using a bow is like training people. You have to bend them to know their limits."
—Laudren

name: Twitchok's Trusty Pistol
description:
"Has never failed me. Well, almost never."
—Twitchok

name: Twitchok's Trusty Pistol
description:
"Keeps the creepy crawlies away."
—Twitchok

name: Glaxx's Focus
description:
"If you concentrate hard enough, you can almost feel the power it contains."
—Glaxx

name: Charged Focus
description:
"A good focus is essential for the accurate chaneling of energy."
—Ahjj

name: Judgment Harpoon
description:
"Great for environmentally friendly sabotage."
—Environmental Activist Jenrys

name: Experimental Skritt Musket
description:
"Point. Shoot. Simple!"
—Twitchok

name: Shipwreck Speargun
description:
"Don't go into the water to rescue Wardens without this speargun. It'll keep those undead off you."
—Danua

name: Razor-Sharp Dagger
description:
"Careful, very sharp!"
—Bordekka

name: Rifle
description:
"Don't want anything getting close to you? Then, you want this."
—Nessi

name: Charged Scepter
description:
"This scepter is humming with energy!"
—Ahjj

name: Improved Southwatch Torch
description:
"Torches will help keep away the undead."
—Cuadinti

name: Perfected Fort Cadence Maul
description:
"This destroys just about anything: artifacts, grubs, even undead. Just keep hitting them until they stop moving."
—Jezza

name: Treasure Hunter's Pistol
description: <c=@flavor>"There, see? Isn't this pistol worth all the explosions, monstrous wurms, giant mosquitoes, and undead you had to go through?" —Admiral Clarinda Demard</c>

name: Glaxx's Focus
description:
"If you concentrate hard enough, you can almost feel the power it contains."
—Glaxx

name: Excavator's Staff
description:
"Don't dig too deep."
—Explorer Cryptcutter

name: Pirate Handblade
description:
"Don't wait for shadows to make the first move. Stab them first."
—Mate Watt

name: Shield
description:
"Does a good job of keeping thorn wolves away."
—Nessi

name: Quandry Torch
description:
"It gets dark down here."
—Sik'klak

name: Seraph Warhorn
description:
"Strikes fear in the heart of your enemies and alerts your allies to danger."
—Goran

name: Model ZIPP01 Focus
description:
"You can't use standard-issue gear, especially in our field of research."
—Researcher Zippti

name: Rich Treasure Hunter's Pistol
description: <c=@flavor>"There, see? Isn't this pistol worth all the explosions, monstrous wurms, giant mosquitoes, and undead you had to go through?" —Admiral Clarinda Demard</c>

name: Caer Brier Mace
description:
"The tools you collected will help maintain the wall. Use these weapons as your tools against the Risen."
—Brannen

name: Orewood Axe
description:
"These are made from specially grown trees. We add a rare ore to soil. The young sampling becomes almost too hard to cut down."
—Warden Llew

name: Packmaster's Warhorn
description:
"The call of the wild is more than just a saying."
—Packmaster Danador

name: Fisher's Shield
description:
"You'd be surprised how many uses a fisher like me has for a shield."
—Fisher Leudap

name: Windgrown Short Bow
description:
"The boughs these are made from grow in the heights of the trees. Some say they learn the winds and help your arrows fly truer. Only one way to find out."
—Warden Llew

name: Improved Southwatch Horn
description:
"Using a warhorn does two things here: it alerts to danger and calls for help."
—Cuadinti

name: Ancient Short Bow
description: <c=@flavor>Although it looks like it belongs in a museum, this bow packs a real punch.</c>

name: Exterminator Torch
description: <c=@flavor>"For ignition and illumination purposes only."</c>

name: Seraph Mace
description:
"Amazingly well balanced, perfect for cracking skulls."
—Aidem

name: Sturdy Dryground Village Longbow
description:
"Using a bow is like training people. You have to bend them to know their limits."
—Laudren

name: Improved Shipwreck Speargun
description:
"Don't go into the water to rescue Wardens without this speargun. It'll keep those undead off you."
—Danua

name: Southwatch Torch
description:
"Torches will help keep away the undead."
—Cuadinti

name: Skritt Pistol
description:
"Has never failed me. Well, almost never."
—Twitchok

name: Hammer of Smashing
description:
"Swing this at someone, and it'll definitely leave a mark."
—Mathair

name: Quandry Torch
description:
"It gets dark down here."
—Sik'klak

name: Gallant's Mace
description:
"These were stolen a while back. It's nice to have them back."
—Zara

name: Seraph Mace
description:
"Amazingly well balanced, perfect for cracking skulls."
—Aidem

name: Woodsman's Axe
description:
"Great for clearing paths of brush and bandits."
—Rhea

name: Chum Trispear
description:
"OOOoah! Quaggan saw what came for the chum and ate the krait! Quaggans use these to fill chum buckets."
—Leemoola

name: Southwatch Horn
description:
"Using a warhorn does two things: it alerts to danger and calls for help."
—Cuadinti

name: Test Associate's Staff Mark II
description:
"It's been recalibrated using the energy readings we took in this area. It'll be quite effective."
—Kamma

name: Brackwater Scepter
description:
"These creatures are just fleeing the undead. It's a shame that they encroach upon the village and have to be dealt with so harshly."
—Quennida

name: Briarthorn Dagger
description:
"These briars are nearly indestructible."
—Warden Spy Alarin

name: Terebinth Staff
description:
"Even the mightiest tree loses a branch from time to time."
—Leigheara

name: Radiation Shield
description: <c=@flavor>"The only thing safer is a golem."</c>

name: Improved Dryground Short Bow
description:
"How do you defeat shambling, slow, diseased, decaying undead? Attack at range."
—Laudren

name: Hemlocked Sword
description:
"There's more than one way to make a blade. These have a touch of the local plants used to fuel our forges."
—Tovar

name: Woodsman's Axe
description:
"Great for clearing paths of brush and bandits."
—Rhea

name: Mossy Scepter
description:
"Found it just lying around in the bog. Imagine that."
—Issa

name: Terebinth Staff
description:
"Whack somebody with this, and they'll remember it...when they wake up"
—Leigheara

name: Seraph Sword
description:
"A Seraph never backs away from a fight."
—Morina

name: Potatlan's Better Axe
description:
"If you think an undead is going to suck out your eyeballs, protect yourself by covering them and swinging!"
—Potatlan

name: Darkvine Greatsword
description:
"The darkvine adds that extra weight and balances out the length of the blade."
—Laewyn

name: Improved Shipwreck Spear
description:
"I heard the sand coo at me, so take this, and use it in the sand if you hear the same."
—Danu

name: Seraph Sword
description:
"A Seraph never backs away from a fight."
—Morina

name: Gallant's Warhorn
description:
"These help us escort caravans to the Pact base."

description:

name: Judgment Speargun

—Environmental Activist Jenrys

name: Perfected Fort Cadence Longblade
description:
"I calculate that this weapon will improve your performance in the field by a huge percentage."
—Jezza

name: Briar Ward
description:
"This wall is our line in the sand. Defenders of this wall are welcome to use our shields."
—Brannen

name: Fort Cadence Longblade
description:
"I calculate that this weapon will improve your performance in the field by a huge percentage."
—Jezza

name: Dysphoric Scepter
description:
"Sometimes new ideas backfire on their creator; and sometimes, they start a fire fueled by genius."

name: Skritt Rifle
description:
"It even has a compass in the stock."
—Twitchok

name: Improved Brackwater Village Focus
description:
"You act with the honor of Wardens. Thank you for your help."

name: Firebreak Greatsword
description:

name: Model ZIPP01 Scepter
description:
